p: Toxicity of DCME extract, epi-cubenol (4) and 15-copaenol (6) was evaluated due to the synergism they showed with ciprofloxacin and oxacillin, reducing the MIC of the antibiotics until 67-fold in the NCTC-8325-4 strain. In addition, DCME, epi-cubenol (4) and 15-copaenol (6) showed activity against efflux pumps in S. aureus.
